item1:
发货条件是20或90的交货单自动分配库存出库
Automatically allocates inventory storage for delivery order that shipping condition is 20 or 90
item2:
由人工挑选交货单启动自动仓出库下架
Manually select the delivery order to start the automatic warehouse move out the allocated pallet
item4:
SAP下传相关Delivery Data
SAP download related delivery data
item6:
拣配数据、更新Delivery数据状态
Picking data, updating Delivery data status
item7:
如果无符合条件的Delivery数据，系统将提示查无可用Delivery信息，用户可执行Data Inquire-->Q050 Delivery Order Data Query作业查询Delivery数据与状态；或挑选指定的Delivery No.
If there is no eligible Delivery data, the system will prompt to check that no Delivery information is available. The user can run the Data Inquire-> Q050 Delivery Order Data Query job to query the Delivery data and status; or select the specified Delivery No.
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选Delivery No后点选Query查询可拣配Delivery表头与明细清单
Enter the query conditions or select Delivery No and click Query to pick the Delivery header and detailed list.
item9:
自动仓库搬运出库
AS/RS move out the pallet
item10:
此作业依据FEFO & FIFO等逻辑自动分配库存。一个托盘不能同时有多个TO分配出库。
This job automatically allocates inventory based on logic such as FEFO & FIFO. One pallet cannot have multiple TO allocated out of the warehouse at the same time.
